typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SalesOrderDetailAbfs
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SalesOrderHeaderAbfs
source(output(
		ProductId as integer,
		Hash as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductDw
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ProductAbfs
SalesOrderDetailAbfs select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesOrderDetailsAbfs
SalesOrderHeaderAbfs select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesOrderHeaderAbfs
ProductDw select(mapColumn(
		dw_ProductId = ProductId,
		dw_ProductNumber = ProductNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductDw
SelectSalesOrderDetailsAbfs, SelectSalesOrderHeaderAbfs join(SelectSalesOrderDetailsAbfs@SalesOrderID == SelectSalesOrderHeaderAbfs@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesOrderHeader
JoinSalesOrderHeader, JoinProductAbfs join(ProductID == dl_ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
ProductAbfs select(mapColumn(
		dl_ProductID = ProductID,
		dl_ProductNumber = ProductNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProductAbfs
SelectProductDw, SelectProductAbfs join(dw_ProductNumber == dl_ProductNumber,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProductAbfs
AlterRow sink(input(
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		OrderQty,
		ProductID = dw_ProductId,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DestDimAnalyticsAxis
